sn55.11:2.1: 2. Rājakārāmavagga
sn55.11:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati rājakārāme.
sn55.11:4.2: Atha kho sahassabhikkhunisaṃgho yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn55.11:4.4: Ekamantaṃ ṭhitā kho tā bhikkhuniyo bhagavā etadavoca:
sn55.11:5.1: “Catūhi kho, bhikkhuniyo, dhammehi samannāgato ariyasāvako sotāpanno hoti avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo.
sn55.11:5.3: Idha, bhikkhuniyo, ariyasāvako buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti—
sn55.11:5.8: ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato hoti, akhaṇḍehi … pe …
sn55.11:5.10: Imehi kho, bhikkhuniyo, catūhi dhammehi samannāgato ariyasāvako sotāpanno hoti avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo”ti.
